description: Verify that the About page loads correctly when accessing the /about URL
scenario: User navigates to the About page to learn about CyberQuest mission and team
expected_results: Display the complete About page with header section, mission content, learning philosophy, team members, and features showcase
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/about
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'About'
5. Verify all main sections are visible and properly formatted

description: Verify the page header section displays correctly with title and subtitle
scenario: User views the About page header with gradient background and animated elements
expected_results: Display 'About CyberQuest' title, subtitle text, animated background elements, and proper styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. Verify header title 'About CyberQuest' is visible
3. Check subtitle 'Empowering digital citizens through gamified cybersecurity education' is displayed
4. Verify gradient background is applied
5. Check animated floating elements are present
6. Verify fade-in animations work properly

description: Verify the Mission section displays content and Get Involved button functionality
scenario: User reads the mission statement and clicks on Get Involved button
expected_results: Display mission heading, descriptive text, and functional Get Involved button that links to contact page
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. Scroll to Mission section
3. Verify 'Our Mission' heading is displayed
4. Check mission description text is visible and readable
5. Verify 'Get Involved' button is present
6. Click 'Get Involved' button
7. Verify it redirects to contact page

description: Verify the Learning Philosophy section displays three methodology cards
scenario: User views the learning approach cards showcasing gamification, AI mentoring, and community features
expected_results: Display 'Learning Through Experience' heading and three cards: Gamification, AI Mentoring, and Community with proper icons and descriptions
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. Scroll to Learning Philosophy section
3. Verify 'Learning Through Experience' heading is displayed
4. Check three cards are visible: Gamification, AI Mentoring, Community
5. Verify each card has appropriate icon (controller, robot, people)
6. Check card descriptions are readable
7. Verify hover effects work on cards
8. Test card animations and transformations

description: Verify the team members section displays all four team members correctly
scenario: User views the team section to learn about CyberQuest team members
expected_results: Display 'Meet Our Team' heading and four team member cards with names and roles
procedure:

2. Scroll to Team Members section
3. Verify 'Meet Our Team' heading is displayed
4. Check four team member cards are visible
5. Verify Jean Alexis L. Santos - Project Manager

description: Verify the features showcase section displays correctly
scenario: User views the features section highlighting what makes CyberQuest different
expected_results: Display 'What Makes CyberQuest Different' heading and call-to-action section
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. Scroll to Features Showcase section
3. Verify 'What Makes CyberQuest Different' heading is displayed
4. Check left side content area is visible
5. Verify right side call-to-action panel is present
6. Check 'Start Your Cybersecurity Adventure' heading
7. Verify any signup/action buttons function correctly
8. Test responsive layout on different screen sizes

description: Verify the About page displays correctly in dark mode
scenario: User toggles to dark mode and views the About page
expected_results: All sections display properly with dark theme colors, readable text, and proper contrast
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. Toggle dark mode using theme switcher
3. Verify page header has dark background gradients
4. Check all text is readable with proper contrast
5. Verify card backgrounds change to dark theme
6. Check team member cards have dark styling
7. Verify all icons and elements are visible in dark mode
8. Test hover effects maintain visibility in dark theme

description: Verify the About page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User views the About page on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page layout adapts properly to different screen sizes with readable content and functional elements
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify all sections display in proper grid layout
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check grid layouts adjust appropriately
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify single column layout on mobile
7. Check all text remains readable
8. Test touch interactions on mobile
9. Verify navigation and buttons work on all sizes

description: Verify that external CSS and JavaScript files load correctly
scenario: User accesses the About page and all styling and interactive elements function
expected_results: about.css and about.js files load successfully, animations work, and styling is applied
procedure:
1. Open browser developer tools
2. Navigate to /about page
3. Check Network tab for successful loading of about.css
4. Verify about.js loads without errors
5. Check Console tab for any JavaScript errors
6. Verify fade-in animations work properly
7. Test hover effects and transitions
8. Check all CSS styling is applied correctly
9. Verify cyber-glow effects are visible

description: Verify that navigation to and from the About page works correctly
scenario: User navigates to About page from different parts of the site and uses navigation menu
expected_results: About page is accessible from main navigation and users can navigate away successfully
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page (/)
2. Click About link in main navigation
3. Verify About page loads correctly
4. Check browser URL shows /about
5. Use browser back button to return to previous page
6. Navigate directly to /about URL
7. Test navigation menu links from About page
8. Verify breadcrumb navigation if present
9. Test deep linking to /about page

description: Verify the About page loads within acceptable time limits
scenario: User accesses the About page and expects fast loading times
expected_results: Page loads completely within 3 seconds with all images, CSS, and JavaScript
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to /about page
4. Record page load time
5. Verify total load time is under 3 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) metrics
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for any render-blocking resources

description: Verify the About page meets SEO and accessibility standards
scenario: User with screen reader accesses the About page and search engines can index content
expected_results: Page has proper heading hierarchy, alt text, and semantic HTML structure
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. View page source and verify proper HTML structure
3. Check heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3) is logical
4. Verify images have appropriate alt text
5. Test page with screen reader
6. Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG guidelines
7. Verify keyboard navigation works
8. Test tab order is logical
9. Check meta tags for SEO
10. Verify semantic HTML elements are used
